name: Color of My Sound: Volume 1
storyline: In the aftermath of a horrific galaxy-wide terrorist attack and war on the Empire by a mysterious rebellion, a highly decorated Officer is transferred to Special Operations Squad Nu under unusual circumstances. Charged with rooting out a Rebel espionage ring, the Officer soon finds himself dragged into a world of Imperial intrigue and politics. His squad is filled with highly skilled individuals each with their own agenda, the Officer will need to earn the loyalty and perhaps even the love of his team to make it through his mission… alive.
summary: Color of My Sound is an enthralling visual novel that combines elements of science fiction, espionage, drama, and eroticism. Immerse yourself in a captivating mystery as you navigate through the intricate web of character agendas, ambitions, and personal struggles.
